sub_title: Head of Biology at Tagworks Pharmaceuticals
summary:
I am an experienced scientist with a passion for tumor immunology, currently working at Tagworks Pharmaceuticals.  

In my jobs Immuno-Oncology always took the center stage. Clinical translation of (academic) results with partners in biotech and pharma is an important element of my work. With this I learned about the specific needs present in these different worlds (Academia, Industry, Regulatory bodies).  

Specific expertise: Cancer Immunotherapy (Immuno-Oncology), Immunology, Oncology, Intervention Radiology, Drug Discovery & Development, R&D, Biobanking, Chemistry.
Immunological assays, Cell-based assays, Vaccine adjuvants, Flowcytometry, Mouse models, Tumor models, Vaccines, Bioinformatics, Click-chemistry, Antibodies, Protein expression.
Project Management, Trial Management, Team leadership & Coaching, Collaborations academia-industry, Grant-writing, Innovation, Contract research.

I am always open to hear about job opportunities and new collaboration projects.


Banner courtesy: Freepik.com
